<p>Back in November, Sony started selling PS5 consoles <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/deals/cyber-monday-ps5-deals-are-still-available-get-100-off-consoles-plus-discounts-on-playstation-games-accessories-and-more-164015817.html?guccounter=1"><ins>at a $100 discount</ins></a> as part of a Black Friday/Cyber Monday promotion. The deal officially sunsets at 3AM ET, so now is a good time to bite the bullet on a gaming console given that prices aren&#39;t likely <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://tech.yahoo.com/gaming/articles/hardware-prices-not-fall-industry-203403984.html"><ins>to go down anytime soon</ins></a>.</p> 
<p>You can pick up a <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FRGTYSL5&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=a6eba115-9a6b-4ac9-bf33-623b739bc112&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=regular+disc-based+PS5+for+%24450&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BsYXlTdGF0aW9uJTI1MjVDMiUyNTI1QUU1LWNvbnNvbGUtMVRCLVBsYXlTdGF0aW9uLTUvZHAvQjBGUkdUWVNMNS8_&amp;signature=AQAAAW9SneG0ssArUU3NMWrVMRSkWuFPzgiGlzbuIYnzD3VQ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation%2525C2%2525AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5%2Fdp%2FB0FRGTYSL5%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation%C2%AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5/dp/B0FRGTYSL5/"><ins>regular disc-based PS5 for $450</ins></a> and a <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FRGMYJMG&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=a6eba115-9a6b-4ac9-bf33-623b739bc112&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=digital+model+for+%24400&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAasQzXJ-Es1FHvharcQWJzryz-_dVjVs7rrA9rpipeTS&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation%2525C2%2525AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5%2Fdp%2FB0FRGMYJMG" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation%C2%AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5/dp/B0FRGMYJMG"><ins>digital model for $400</ins></a>. The beefy PS5 Pro <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGY63Z2H&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=a6eba115-9a6b-4ac9-bf33-623b739bc112&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=is+available+for+%24650&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BsYXlTdGF0aW9uJTI1MjVDMiUyNTI1QUU1LWNvbnNvbGUtMVRCLVBsYXlTdGF0aW9uLTUvZHAvQjBER1k2M1oySC8_&amp;signature=AQAAAZb4nlTb2d1IiaZ7_SvxH-ie2MQVaSzOChKGqY3D-CbN&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation%2525C2%2525AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5%2Fdp%2FB0DGY63Z2H%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation%C2%AE5-console-1TB-PlayStation-5/dp/B0DGY63Z2H/"><ins>is available for $650</ins></a>. All of these deals are active on Amazon, but also <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=a6eba115-9a6b-4ac9-bf33-623b739bc112&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;linkText=directly+from+Sony&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAVjlnnhXHDRXdn-sGHzMhcZTDAoVlBBjvQZYYQwsxZYB&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fdirect.playstation.com%2Fen-us%2Fhardware%2Fps5" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://direct.playstation.com/en-us/hardware/ps5"><ins>directly from Sony</ins></a>.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>If the costs here still sound a bit high, that&#39;s because Sony <a data-i13n="cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/gaming/playstation/sony-raises-ps5-console-prices-in-the-us-153429564.html"><ins>raised console prices by $50</ins></a> back in August. In other words, these $100 discounts are pretty much $50 discounts when factoring in that recent increase. Still, cheaper is cheaper. This puts the digital PS5 at the same price as an Xbox Series S and the disc-based version at the same price as a Switch 2.</p> 
<p>Both standard PS5 configurations won&#39;t arrive until December 28. The PS5 Pro, however, is available for same-day shipping if you&#39;re jonesing for one last holiday gift.</p> 
<p>The PS5 has a fairly large stable of exclusive titles made by Sony-owned studios. These include games like <em>Horizon Forbidden West</em>, <em>Astro Bot</em>, <em>Death Stranding 2</em> and <em>Ghost of Yotei</em>.</p>
